segments.text: I wonder what he looks like . Oh , I can't wait to see him ! His email said he'd be wearing a white hat . ( looking around for him ) oh , there he is .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Logan ! Why on earth are you hiding here ? White hat ! Come on ! Don't tell me you're the guy ! It can't be true .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: what a bummer ! You set me up ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: let me explain . I didn't mean to hurt you ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: hang on a second . Hear me out , just this once , Isabella !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: why did you lie to me in the email ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I didn't lie . You just didn't ask me my real name .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I should have known it was you . No wonder all the 20 questions were answered correctly . I thought I might have found the one for me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry . It was cruel of me . But I promise it will never happen again ? Look , there's a nice restaurant . Let me take you to dinner and we can talk things over .
segments.speaker: S2
